name: Stardash - Remastered
description:
This is a 2018-remastered version of the original game. Now with gamepad support, slightly improved gameplay, but all the good old fun of the original version.

See if you have the skills of the 90's arcade games, survive the many levels by running and jumping, collecting coins, and unlocking special Temple levels.

Stardash is all about gameplay thrown at you in awesome retro graphics and original chiptunes.
